recoverconfig.description: If true, then the website's configuration will be reverted to its state at SnapshotTime

snapshottime.description: Point in time in which the site recover should be attempted.

sitename.description: [Optional] Destination web app name into which web app should be recovered. This is case when new web app should be created instead.

slotname.description: [Optional] Destination web app slot name into which web app should be recovered

recovery_entity.description: Snapshot data used for web app recovery. Snapshot information can be obtained by calling GetDeletedSites or GetSiteSnapshots API.

slot.description: Name of web app slot. If not specified then will default to production slot.
